description: Information about a process completed in the experiment.
title: Process
name: process

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

schema_type.description: The type of the metadata schema entity.

provenance.description: Provenance information added or generated at time of ingest.
provenance.title: Provenance
provenance.name: provenance

submission_date.description: When project was first submitted to database.

submitter_id.description: ID of individual who first submitted project.

updater_id.description: ID of individual who last updated project.

document_id.comment: This structure supports the current ingest API. It may change in the future.

accession.description: A unique accession for this entity, provided by the broker.

process_core.description: Information relevant to how a biomaterial or file was converted into another biomaterial or file.
process_core.title: Process core
process_core.name: process_core

process_id.description: A unique ID for the process.

process_name.description: A short, descriptive name for the process that need not be unique.

process_description.description: A general description of the process.

process_location.description: Location where the process took place.
process_location.example: Wellcome Trust Sanger Institute; Cancer Institute, Stanford University

operator.description: Identifier for individual(s) who executed the process.

length_of_time.description: Length of time the process took to execute in Length of time unit.
length_of_time.guidelines: Enter a single value or a range of values separated by a hyphen.

length_of_time_unit.description: A term that may be associated with a time unit-related ontology term
length_of_time_unit.title: Time unit ontology
length_of_time_unit.name: time_unit_ontology

text.description: The name of a time unit being used.

ontology.description: An ontology term identifier in the form prefix:accession

ontology_label.description: The preferred label for the ontology term referred to in the ontology field. This may differ from the user-supplied value in the text field

process_type.description: A term that may be associated with a process-related ontology term
process_type.title: Process type ontology
process_type.name: process_type_ontology

text.description: The name of a process type being used.

ontology.description: An ontology term identifier in the form prefix:accession

ontology_label.description: The preferred label for the ontology term referred to in the ontology field. This may differ from the user-supplied value in the text field

deviation_from_protocol.description: A deviation from the protocol provided.
deviation_from_protocol.example: Skipped ACK lysis step; Used 100um filter instead of 40um filter

insdc_experiment.description: Information relating to an INSDC experiment.
insdc_experiment.title: INSDC experiment
insdc_experiment.name: insdc_experiment

insdc_experiment.description: An International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration (INSDC) experiment accession.
insdc_experiment.guidelines: Enter accession if experiment has been archived. Accession can be from the DDBJ, NCBI, or EMBL-EBI and must start with DRX, SRX, or ERX, respecitvely.
